response.job_title: Manager equipo de mantenimiento Kiwicampus SAS
response.summary: I am a mechanical engineer skilled in critical thinking and problem solving abilities. I am empathetic, supportive and a good communicator with technical abilities in mechanics and electronics. I have two years of experience working as the lead of my own department, managing a team of 30 people and helping them plan, develop and follow up their projects. I'm also interested in automation, control and transmission mechanical design. I enjoy playing sports and reading, learning about new topics and having time with my pets. I’m fluent in Spanish and English and I want to learn Portuguese.
response.skills: Ingeniería mecánica, Inglés, Gestión de proyectos, Ingeniería, Diseño de productos mecánicos, Gestión de mantenimiento

profile_positions.description:
Maintenance Team Lead
I’m in charge of the fleet of robots currently dispatched in our service zones. I’m also responsible for planning the robot distribution for new business. I manage the logistics related to the company’s resources (i.e. robots, parts, personnel). I’m currently leading the development of a preventive maintenance plan for the company.
profile_positions.title: Manager equipo mantenimiento

profile_positions.description: Support in the manufacture of the product developed in the company, inventory monitoring, correction of manufacturing manuals and product testing in the field.
profile_positions.title: Ingeniero mecánico

company.name: Kiwibot
company.description: If you wish for it, we deliver it  🌎 🥝
